summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving under an overpass. A silver sedan is seen moving from the right side of the frame towards the left, potentially cutting into the self-driving vehicles lane. The traffic light ahead turns green, indicating the vehicles can proceed.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while approaching the intersection. The silver sedan on the right side is moving towards the left, potentially cutting into the self-driving vehicles lane. The self-driving vehicle needs to be cautious and possibly decelerate to avoid collision.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A silver sedan, approximately 2 meters away, moving towards the left, potentially cutting into the self-driving vehicles lane. 2) Front: Traffic light, indicating green, allowing vehicles to proceed.
